verse: This is a ·message [prophecy; oracle; burden] about Egypt:

In that day the Egyptians will be like women [physically weak and vulnerable]. They will ·be afraid of [tremble with fear at] the Lord ·All-Powerful [Almighty; of Heaven’s Armies; of hosts], because he will raise his hand to strike them down.

The land of Judah will ·bring fear [be a terror] to Egypt. Anyone there who hears the name Judah will be afraid, because the Lord ·All-Powerful [Almighty; of Heaven’s Armies; of hosts] has planned terrible things for them.

·At that time [In that day] five cities in Egypt will speak the language of Canaan [Hebrew or Aramaic, evidence of Israel’s dominance over Egypt], and they will ·promise to be loyal [swear allegiance] to the Lord ·All-Powerful [Almighty; of Heaven’s Armies; of hosts]. One of these cities will be named the City of Destruction.
·At that time [In that day] there will be an altar for the Lord in the middle of Egypt and a ·monument [or sacred pillar] to the Lord at the border of Egypt.

This will be a sign and a witness to the Lord ·All-Powerful [Almighty; of Heaven’s Armies; of hosts] in the land of Egypt. When the people cry to the Lord for help, he will send a savior and defender, who will rescue them.

So the Lord will ·show himself [make himself known] to the Egyptians, and ·then [in that day] they will ·know he is [acknowledge; know] the Lord. They will ·worship [serve] God ·and offer many sacrifices [with sacrifices and offerings]. They will make ·promises [vows] to the Lord and will keep them.
The Lord will ·punish [strike] the Egyptians, but then he will heal them. They will ·come back [return] to the Lord, and he will listen to their ·prayers [pleas] and heal them.

·At that time [In that day] there will be a highway from Egypt to Assyria, and the Assyrians will go to Egypt, and the Egyptians will go to Assyria. The Egyptians and Assyrians will worship God together.
·At that time [In that day] ·Israel, Assyria, and Egypt will join together [Israel will be the third, with Egypt and Assyria; a great power like them], which will be a blessing for the earth.

The Lord ·All-Powerful [Almighty; of Heaven’s Armies; of hosts] will bless them, saying, “Egypt, you are my people. Assyria, ·I made you [the work of my hands]. Israel, ·I own you [my inheritance]. You are all blessed!”
